channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Polar vortex keeps a huge swath of the US in its icy grip
item.description: A huge swath of the U.S. is being blasted by ice, snow and wind, as the polar vortex that dipped south over the weekend is keeping an area stretching from the Rocky Mountains to the coast of Maine in its frigid grip.

item.title: Trump’s lawyers ask judge to halt Friday’s hush money case sentencing while they appeal to block it
Biden is traveling to New Orleans following the French Quarter attack that killed 14 and injured 30
